snippet: Investment companies have spent billions of dollars to buy thousands of individual homes in hopes of reaping big profits when the industry rebounds.
abstract: Flurry of private-equity giants and hedge funds have spent billions of dollars to buy thousands of individual homes in hopes of reaping big profits when the industry rebounds.
lead_paragraph: Investment companies have spent billions of dollars to buy thousands of individual homes in hopes of reaping big profits when the industry rebounds.

headline.main: Big Money Bets on a Housing Rebound
headline.print_headline: Big Money Bets on a Housing Rebound
